name: Ecorobot - Ideal Sustainable City
description:
This is a university degree final assignment for the course - Multimedia Design 2.

*Road signs with words (Nature Park, LRT Station, Sustainable City & Unsustainable City) are teleporters. Go to other scenes by touching the side or back of the road sign. 

*Use mouse to look around, arrow keys /W, A, S, D keys to move around & spacebar to jump 

*To close the exe file, don't press esc key as it won't do anything, instead just press the Windows key and close it from the taskbar.
